gui

Class VillainsScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.VillainsScreen

  • public class VillainsScreen
extends java.lang.Object
    GUI screen for battling the villain. The user can check the health of their heroes. The villain's information is displayed. The user chooses a hero to fight with, and then the battles begin. This screen is returned to after battles. The screen displays end game message if neccesary, or progresses the user to the next city.
    Author:
    dle70.

      • generateHeroNames

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> generateHeroNames()
        Creates an ArrayList of names of all the heroes in the team. This is used in the combobox, so the user can select a hero to battle with.
        Returns:
        options - List of hero's names in the team.
